plot: Jerome has fallen in love with a young woman and so attempts to seduce her. Day after day, he tells his friend, Patrick, of his every move. Patrick hands out advice and lives, vicariously, through the adventures of his young friend.
title: Fille du calvaire
plot_es: Jerome has fallen in love with a young woman and so attempts to seduce her. Day after day, he tells his friend, Patrick, of his every move. Patrick hands out advice and lives, vicariously, through the adventures of his young friend.
plot_en: Jerome has fallen in love with a young woman and so attempts to seduce her. Day after day, he tells his friend, Patrick, of his every move. Patrick hands out advice and lives, vicariously, through the adventures of his young friend.
